description:
See more ISP reviews: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLCZHp4d1HnIsDHLqVf4Yd622YiRY0aYRJ - A number of people have commented on my prior Frontier Fiber reviews about how well the service is holding up a year or two later. The good news is that it has been very fast and reliable. The bad news is that the cost went up quite a bit. See my latest videos: http://lon.tv/latest and subscribe! http://lon.tv/s

VIDEO INDEX:
00:00 - Intro
00:35 - Supporter Thank Yous
01:05 - Service Quality Two Years Later
02:29 - YouTubeTV Update 
03:26 - Billing Increases
05:39 - Current Service Tiers
08:05 - Verizon Buying Frontier?

title: Frontier Fiber 2 Years Later: Keep an Eye on the Bill!
